sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you can eat <radical>grain</radical>s while running up <radical>stairs</radical>, you'll <kanji>excel</kanji> at everything.
meaningInfo: This special workout routine is so hard that, if you can do it, you'll be able to excel at every other thing you try.
readingMnemonic: In order to <kanji>excel</kanji> at this, though, you need a good pair of <reading>shoe</reading>s (<ja>しゅう</ja>).
readingInfo: You have to eat the grains AND run up the stairs, or you aren't actually excelling. Good shoes will help you get there faster and protect your toes.
